edges.name: Arsenal
edges.description: You have access to weapons, tactical equipment, and combat gear. Whether through military connections, black market contacts, or careful acquisition, you're never without the tools of the hunt.

perks.name: Well-Armed
perks.description: You always carry at least one concealed weapon and know how to use it effectively. +1 to attack rolls with your signature weapon.

perks.name: Improvisational Gear
perks.description: You're skilled at creating tools and weapons from everyday objects. You can craft makeshift equipment with what's at hand.

perks.name: Ordnance
perks.description: You have access to explosives, grenades, and other heavy ordnance. Requires proper licensing or black market connections.

perks.name: Global Access
perks.description: Your hunter has access to resources and equipment across international borders. You can acquire specialized gear in most major cities.

edges.name: Library
edges.description: You have access to rare books, ancient texts, and occult knowledge. Your research materials give you an edge in understanding supernatural threats.

perks.name: Antiquarian
perks.description: You have access to rare books, ancient texts, and occult knowledge. Add 2 dice when researching supernatural threats.

perks.name: Trivia
perks.description: Your mind is a repository of obscure facts and useful information. Gain bonus dice on Intelligence + Investigation rolls.

perks.name: Archivist
perks.description: You maintain detailed records of encounters and supernatural phenomena. You can recall specific details from past hunts.

perks.name: Artifact
perks.description: You possess a supernatural artifact with mysterious properties. The artifact has one supernatural ability.

perks.name: Tome
perks.description: You own a grimoire or occult tome containing powerful supernatural knowledge. Consulting it grants bonuses to relevant rolls.
perks.mechanical_benefit: Bonus to occult rolls when consulting tome

edges.name: Logistics
edges.description: You have access to bases, vehicles, and operational infrastructure. These resources provide safety, mobility, and tactical advantages.

perks.name: Safehouse
perks.description: You maintain a secure location for planning, storing equipment, and recovering between hunts. It's protected and secret.

perks.name: Safehouse Network
perks.description: You have access to multiple safehouses across a region or country, providing shelter and resources wherever you operate.

perks.name: Fleet
perks.description: You have access to multiple vehicles for different situations: surveillance van, fast pursuit vehicle, heavy transport.

perks.name: Mobile Operations Center
perks.description: You operate from a customized vehicle equipped with surveillance equipment, communications gear, and field hospital supplies.

perks.name: Surveillance Hub
perks.description: Your base is equipped with advanced surveillance equipment: cameras, listening devices, network monitoring tools.

edges.name: Ordination
edges.description: Your faith protects and empowers you. Whether through religious conviction or unwavering belief, you can resist and repel supernatural evil.

perks.name: True Faith
perks.description: Your unwavering belief manifests as tangible power. Supernatural creatures feel pain in your presence.
perks.mechanical_benefit: Faith causes pain to supernatural beings

perks.name: Body and Soul
perks.description: Your faith protects you from supernatural influence. Add dice to resist mental domination, possession, or supernatural fear.
perks.mechanical_benefit: +2 dice to resist supernatural mental effects

perks.name: Consecrate
perks.description: You can bless locations, making them uncomfortable or harmful to supernatural creatures. The effect lasts for one scene.

perks.name: Holy Icon
perks.description: You possess a blessed religious symbol that repels certain supernatural creatures. Its effectiveness depends on your faith.

perks.name: Repel the Unnatural
perks.description: Your presence disturbs supernatural creatures. They feel uncomfortable near you and may flee if their resolve is weak.

edges.name: Tradecraft
edges.description: You have training in espionage, infiltration, and covert operations. You can disappear, assume new identities, and operate in the shadows.

perks.name: Alternative Identity
perks.description: You maintain one or more fake identities complete with documentation. Useful for infiltration and avoiding detection.

perks.name: Clean Slate
perks.description: Your records have been scrubbed. Digital searches turn up nothing, and physical records have been destroyed or altered.

perks.name: Dragnet
perks.description: You can set up an information network to track a target. Once established, you receive updates on their movements.

perks.name: Sleeper
perks.description: You have a background in intelligence work and can activate old contacts, safe houses, and information channels.

perks.name: Streetwise Network
perks.description: You have contacts in the criminal underworld who provide information, black market access, and street-level intelligence.

edges.name: Network
edges.description: You're connected to other hunters, community members, and informants. Your network provides intelligence, support, and backup.

perks.name: Strategic Network
perks.description: You're connected to hunters across regions who share intelligence and coordinate operations against supernatural threats.

perks.name: Community Organizer
perks.description: You can mobilize community members for support, information gathering, or direct action. Your cell gains local allies.

perks.name: Mole
perks.description: You have an informant inside a supernatural organization or enemy cell. They provide intelligence but expect protection.

perks.name: Victim Support Network
perks.description: You maintain connections with survivors of supernatural encounters who provide information and early warnings.

perks.name: Fixation
perks.description: You're obsessed with a specific type of supernatural creature. You gain bonus dice when hunting this quarry type.

edges.name: Preparedness
edges.description: You're always ready for the unexpected. Through planning, training, and preparation, you can handle any situation the hunt throws at you.

perks.name: Go Bag
perks.description: You maintain emergency supplies that let you operate independently for 48 hours: cash, burner phones, basic weapons.

perks.name: First Aid
perks.description: You carry medical supplies and know emergency trauma care. You can stabilize dying hunters and treat injuries in the field.

perks.name: Fortified Position
perks.description: You can quickly secure a location with barriers, traps, and defensive measures. Attackers face increased difficulty.

perks.name: Prepared for Anything
perks.description: Once per session, you can produce an item you 'remembered to pack' that's reasonable for your character to have.

perks.name: Bystander
perks.description: You blend into crowds and appear unremarkable. Supernatural creatures and surveillance systems overlook you.

edges.name: Custom Edge
edges.description: Create your own edge with Storyteller approval. Work with your ST to define the edge's theme and available perks.

perks.name: Custom Perk 1
perks.description: Define this perk with your Storyteller.

perks.name: Custom Perk 2
perks.description: Define this perk with your Storyteller.

perks.name: Custom Perk 3
perks.description: Define this perk with your Storyteller.

options.name: 1 Edge + 2 Perks
options.description: Choose one Edge and select two Perks from that Edge

options.name: 2 Edges + 1 Perk
options.description: Choose two different Edges and select one Perk from either Edge
